page.title: 12Doctors Interview cont
page.content: {Q. Is this area a healthy place to {live?} A. Yes, it's certainly healthier than the West Riding or Lancashire. {Q. Are there a lot more stress related {illnesses than there used to be?} A. Yes, particularly because of increased unemployment and the increased demand of employers. Where people have seen their colleagues made redundant, they're often having to work harder to secure their jobs, and this can lead to their succumbing to a certain amount of stress. {Q. Apart from doctors, what other {services are provided by the health {centre for the public?} A. Social Services provide a vast range of services eg. home helps; advice; providing apparatus for the disabled etc.. District nurses provide nursing both at home and the centre.
